snippet.title: Yasha: Legends of the Demon Blade - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Slay the wicked in this gorgeous Japanese-style world of roguelite!
Set in the Edo period, Yasha: Legends of the Demon Blade is an action RPG with roguelite mechanisms.

Mastering the Demon Blades and fighting hordes of demons in the Edo period as Shigure the kunoichi. 
With each adventure, you will unravel the truth about her immortality.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2169950

Follow us on social media!
- Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/7quark
- Twitter：https://twitter.com/7quarkgames
- Instagram：https://www.instagram.com/7quark_games/
